title: Crime Alert 06.25.20
itunes:title: Crime Alert 06.25.20
description:
A perp previously arrested 103 times shoves a 92-year-old woman to the ground. A Missouri man tries to float down river to get away from a traffic violation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
